title: Add ConstraintsPanel
body: Add a panel that allows to create a design with constraints (and support in Blend)

comments.body:
Currently Android and iOS have the possibility to use constraints to create a layout, for Apple - AutoLayout and Android- ConstraintsLayout.
While in UWP Xaml it is possible to create a lot of layouts through the relative layout it is however limited. For example it is not possible to align a bottom of a view to another view center.
Thank you for your feedback. Can you elaborate on this idea? Is there documentation from other platforms that already enable the behavior you're hoping for?
